author: The Editorial Board
title: Auto-Lending Lemon Repeal
text:
Deregulation has been a major Republican policy success in the current Congress, and the GOP may not be done. Next up for the potential axe: The notorious auto-lending rule.
This is an Obama Administration classic. Recall that Dodd-Frank expressly prohibited the Consumer Financial Protection Bureau from regulating auto dealers. That didnâ€™t stop former CFPB chief Richard Cordray, who used the back door of auto-financing to regulate dealers. He set about trying to show that minorities pay higher interest rates than whites on...
